articles.author: Lawrence Abrams
articles.title: Lockbit's seized site comes alive to tease new police announcements - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The NCA, FBI, and Europol have revived a seized LockBit ransomware data leak site to hint at new information being revealed by law enforcement this Tuesday.
articles.content:
The NCA, FBI, and Europol have revived a seized LockBit ransomware data leak site to hint at new information being revealed by law enforcement this Tuesday.
